ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] The good news :)
ygData.msgSnippet: i love to charm too.  but this opens up a huge new avenue for us to crowd control.  not only no secondary resist, but longer duration, which is my favorite
ygData.messageBody:
i love to charm too. but this opens up a huge new avenue for us to crowd
control. not only no secondary resist, but longer duration, which is my
favorite part since if they really do it right we have a chance to lock
something down for longer than the normal 12-18 second song duration. i
think that's huge, as we can easily keep multiple mobs under control.

Shada

> i remember those days, but ya know what? I prefer to charm. = )
>
> I even played chanter for a good 30 min in howling stones
> last week when our
> chanter went LD.
